Neue Gruppe Neue Gerätegruppe Gruppe editieren
Timer
EWeLink is a free smart home APP. \n\nEWeLink can control all smart home products from ITEAD and cooperated partners. It supports remotely turn on/off connected devices, set timing schedules, share devices, manage group and scene/smart scene. With EWeLink, you can adjust color and brightness for multiple RGB LED, you can monitor temperature and humidity for Sonoff TH, you can even monitor the air quality. \n\nMore devices are under development, please stay tuned. Mein Gerät

Confirm Device On Pairing State Long press the matching button for about 5 seconds to keep the device into the pairing state. If your device is dimming LED, please turn it on and off for 3 times, the time gap between turn on and off should be 2s, the LED indicator will blink to enter into pairing state. Other Pairing Methods Instruction Choose a Wifi for Device Pairing... Pair Fail Unable to find the device, please check the following configuration Communication process error, please operate by following the instructions Please check Mobile Security and Antivirus software permission setting, make sure eWeLink can access to WiFi and location. Your device is not in pairing mode, enter into pairing mode now. Failed to switch to device WiFi, please manually connect it. Steps: go to system WiFi Setting, connect with the WiFi -"ITEAD-******" with password \"12345678\". This is the 1st communication timeout, please retry This is the 2nd communication timeout, please retry Make sure you have entered correct WiFi password Failed, make sure your mobile network works, please add again Then return to eWeLink. (Has not connected device\'s host) Select the device No optional device offline No devices currently, tap on below button to add Timer Single channel socket/switch support loop timer now! Loop timer can be auto-executed every preset time(say 1hr), and continue for a shorter preset time(say 20min). Supported firmware version 1.5.0 and higher. Want your family and friends control your devices? Just let them register an account, then share your devices! Share device Enter eWeLink Back Internet of Everything
